definition: a muscular partition separating the abdominal and thoracic cavities
details:
noun
- a muscular partition separating the abdominal and thoracic cavities
= example: a muscular partition separating the abdominal and thoracic cavities
= synonyms: diaphragm
- the middle area of the human torso (usually in front)

= synonyms: middle
